data.text: Mohd qaisar did a perfect job cleaning our room every day and he always made sure that everything is to our liking. In general the room was great and always clean the beach was good food was good but the hotel is a little bit small but it was all in all a good stay because it was always clean.
data.title: Great rooms

data.text:
We had the worst vacation ever here. C Central Hotel did not inform us before arrival that there are two huge constructionsites right next to the hotel.

What a big surprise when we arrived here after our flight from germany. This insane noise from 8am to 6pm made it impossible to relax at the beach. We complained but they didnt accept cancellation. After a while they sent us to a partner hotel for the daytime to find relaxationtime at another beach. We had to pay the taxi of course.Breakfast and Dinner was alright but in compare to other hotels and for this price under expectations.Rooms have not be cleaned properly before we arrived. Some black hairs between our white towels were disgusting. Balcony door could not be closed properly, so again the constructionsites were loud and annoying.We are really disappointed of the service we experienced. Every guest should be properly informed about the real conditions on site.
data.title: Beware of high noise level. Huge Constructionsites next to this Hotel.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Journey,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience that may have been caused during your recent stay.

Please understand that the construction in the area is beyond our control, as it is part of the city/country's development plan by the government. 

Please know that we take your concerns seriously and are committed to addressing them to ensure that they do not happen again in the future. Your satisfaction is of utmost importance to us, and we will do our best to serve you better during your next visit.

We appreciate your understanding and patience in this matter. We look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back and provide you with a more enjoyable stay.

Thank you once again for your feedback.

Sincerely,
Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Rafat Mohammad

data.text:
From da we arrived we were treated nicely.
Reception guys we amazing 
We were very happy with everything 
Sabnam   And  Rohit very very helpful and make sured that our room was spotless and always had everything we needed.
Hotel is small so perfect as not busy and crowdy.
Food was fantastic tasty and lost of different opinions.
Our trip was simply perfect 
Thank you
data.title: Wonderful

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Lucia,

Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback regarding your recent stay at C Central Hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that our associates made a positive impact on your experience. 

We look forward to welcoming you back to C Central Hotel in the near future. If there is anything else we can assist you with, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us.

Warm regards,
Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Rafat Mohammad

data.text: Nice little hotel. It is located on a Palm. Buses run to the moll of Emirates. The staff is polite and good-natured. The room is cleaned every day. The cleaning is of high quality. Breakfast buffet. Various. There are fruits. There is practically no seafood. Of the disadvantages is a construction site nearby.
data.title: Have a good time. Excellent housekeeping

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We greatly appreciate your kind words regarding the cleanliness of our HK team. It is always rewarding to hear that our efforts are being noticed and valued by our guests.

We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back to our hotel in the near future. If there is anything else we can do to enhance your experience, please do not hesitate to let us know.

Thank you once again for your feedback and for choosing to stay with us.

Warm regards,
Hotel Management.
owner_response.author: Rafat Mohammad

data.text: We had a fantastic stay at this hotel! The cleanliness was impeccable, and the service was top-notch. The room service was prompt and efficient, and I must mention Mr. Md Qaishar, who was exceptionally kind and truly excelled at his job. We were thoroughly impressed with the level of care and attention to detail throughout our stay. However, the only minor inconvenience was the construction site next door, but of course, the hotel cannot control external factors like that. Despite this, our overall experience was still outstanding.
data.title: Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback regarding your recent stay at C Central Hotel. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that our associates made a positive impact on your experience. 

We truly value your feedback and it is always a pleasure to receive such positive comments. Our team works hard to ensure that all our guests have a memorable stay, and it is rewarding to hear that we have succeeded in providing you with a great experience.

We look forward to welcoming you back to C Central Hotel in the near future. If there is anything else we can assist you with, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Thank you once again for choosing to stay with us.

Warm regards,
Hotel Management.
